alert.note: Alert for Latah (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 04 at 7:33PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of North Idaho, including the following county, Latah. Portions of Southeast Washington, including eastern portions of the following county, Whitman. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas is expected. Rises on small streams are expected to continue through the night as well. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 631 PM PDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated moderate to heavy rains of 1 to 2 inches have fallen. Up to another half inch of rain is possible before the rain tapers off by morning. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
